name: CVE-2022-29824
description: In libxml2 before 2.9.14, several buffer handling functions in buf.c (xmlBuf*) and tree.c (xmlBuffer*) don't check for integer overflows. This can result in out-of-bounds memory writes. Exploitation requires a victim to open a crafted, multi-gigabyte XML file. Other software using libxml2's buffer functions, for example libxslt through 1.1.35, is affected as well.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:xmlsoft:libxml2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:xmlsoft:libxslt:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:34:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:35:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:36:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:11.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:snapdrive:-:*:*:*:*:unix:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:ontap_select_deploy_administration_utility:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:clustered_data_ontap:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:smi-s_provider:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:clustered_data_ontap_antivirus_connector:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:active_iq_unified_manager:-:*:*:*:*:vmware_vsphere:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:manageability_software_development_kit:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_baseboard_management_controller:h300s:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_baseboard_management_controller:h500s:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_baseboard_management_controller:h700s:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_baseboard_management_controller:h300e:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_baseboard_management_controller:h500e:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_baseboard_management_controller:h700e:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_baseboard_management_controller:h410s:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_baseboard_management_controller:h410c:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:snapmanager:-:*:*:*:*:hyper-v:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:zfs_storage_appliance_kit:8.8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
